title: FK87 Style Grasshopper Lounge Chair Black
body: The Mobelaris style of the Grasshopper Lounge Chair, taking on the form of the Grasshopper, Preben Frabricius & Jorgen Kastholm studied the form of the insect and were taken in by the form of such a unique creature. Manufctured with the highest quality stainless steel the profile of the piece has splayed legs on it profile to recreate the legs of the insect, enabling a little give, the frame is then covered with a thick canvas material to support the sumptuous Premium Aniline cushions.
